kpi_info.title: NE_MUX_BBE
kpi_info.use: Multiplex section background block errors at the near end. An errored block is a block in which one or more bits have an error. B2 byte in the section overhead header (SOH) is used for multiplex section error monitoring using Bit Interleaved Parity 24 (BIP-24) code, in an even parity. The BIP-24 is computed over all the bits of the previous STM frame, excluding RSOH, and is placed in byte B2 of the current frame before scrambling. In this case the block means STM-1 frame. UPDATED:The counter is incremented when one or more bit errors are detected in a block (STM-1 frame, excluding RSOH). The counter is not updated during the SES and UAS conditions.
